name: quick-powder
effect: Held by Ditto: Doubles the holder’s initial Speed.
short_effect: Doubles Ditto’s Speed when held. The boost is lost after transforming.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
